dmca.title: Fwd: [ABUSE] Potential Liability Notice]
dmca.body:
Nc

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 08, 2005 1:57 AM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Potential Liability Notice]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------

Cc:
Subject: [ABUSE] Potential Liability Notice

X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>

<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.8

Hello,
You host a website for www.unodemocrats.com.  On their website they not only
reproduce copyrighted material without proper permissions but they are now
also engaging in libel against a local political candidate.
~ You have 24 hours to discontinue service to this organization or you will
be included as a co-defendent in a copyright infringement and liable
lawsuits being filed in Omaha, NE on April 8, 2005.



__________________________________
